content.title: Map the Service to the UI Elements
content.body:
• From the left pane select FirstName {string}.
    From the right pane expand Label - lblFirstNameValue, and select text {string}.
  • From the left pane select LastName {string}.
    From the right pane expand Label - lblLastNameValueand select text {string}.
  • From the left pane, select Nick Name {string}. 
    From the right pane expand Label - lblNickNameValueand select text {string}.
  • From the left pane, select Phone {string}.
    From the right pane expand Label - lblPhoneValue and select text {string}.
  1. Click Save.
